document.docAuthor: Escalante, Patricio De Los Rios & Kotov, Alexey A.
document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of Branchiopoda (Anostraca and Cladocera) of Chilean continental waters

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of Branchiopoda (Anostraca and Cladocera) of Chilean continental waters

subSubSection.paragraph:
Representatives of the subgenus
Bosmina ( Eubosmina ) Seligo, 1900
are absent in South America , they are replaced by taxa from the subgenus B. (
Liederobosmina
)
Brtek, 1997
. This taxon was proposed to replace B . (
Neobosmina
) Lieder, 1957 which was found to be a homonym of earlier proposed insect genus (
Brtek 1997
; Kotov et al. 2009 ). According to Paggi's ( 1979 ) outline of the "
Neobosmina
" species differentiation, Ekman's ( 1900 , Fig. 20 ) population belongs to
B. huaronensis
.
